items.sentence: Tom has a lot of money, but not many friends.
When Tom tried to kiss Mary, she slapped him.
When do we get to do something for ourselves?
Tom seems to be unwilling to make a decision.
Tom seems to want this as badly as Mary does.
Tom told me that I wasn\'t going to be fired.
Tom told me that he doesn\'t know what to do.
It looks like you\'re trying to grow a beard.
I\'m pretty sure Tom wouldn\'t be interested.
I wanted to tell Tom about what had happened.
I don\'t see why Tom wouldn\'t want to dance.
What do you think is the best way to do this?
What else do you think Tom is planning to do?
Tom is the only one who knows how to do that.
I didn\'t feel uneasy when I read the letter.
Tom wanted to spend some time in the country.
Tom warned Mary not to go out at night alone.
Yesterday Tom was a little better than usual.
You always said you wanted to live in Boston.
You and I should eat lunch together sometime.
